title: PowerToys 0.55 brings another new tool to help you locate the mouse cursor easily
content:
In October last year, Microsoft released a major update for its PowerToys suite. The update included a new Find My Mouse tool, which helped users easily locate the mouse cursor on their screens by shining a spotlight on it.
